name: Chance Adventure
description:
This is the game entry for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

The game was made from the ground up in C++. 

The SFML programing library was used and it was coded in Visual Studio Community 2019.

Being a hobby programmer and an artist, this is my first time attempting a Game Jam. The game isn't much, it is just a simple turn based battler, but at least I've finished it during the Jam period, and that to me is an accomplishment by itself. :D

The instructions are simple - just click on the opponent to do damage to them, use Q and E to switch skills. All damage is randomized (as per the theme of the Game Jam - Roll of the Dice)

Thank you for playing.

All of the artwork is made by me.

The sound is made with ChipTone program, made by SFB games

The music track (The Ancient Legend) taken from OpenGameArt.org, made by vitalezzz. https://opengameart.org/content/the-ancient-legend
